item.description:

2. Insiders who want power and influence in a Harris administration, trying to curry favor instead of criticizing her openly?

Furman, Dylan Matthews, Larry Summers - many people who should know better have been complimenting her econ policies in public. It's a profound moral failure.

item.title: Comment on Crypto is the Money for AIs by Michael LeMay
item.description:
What is a single advantage of having agent AIs use crypto over regular money?

Make it easier for your agent to buy illegal things without detection and commit crimes on your behalf? That’s the only one that comes to mind.

Just face it, crypto is *useless*. It’s a speculative asset class that’s also useful for doing illegal things.
